response.overview: Zheng Yi Sao (née Shi), forced into piracy prostitution, married Zheng Yi, co-ruling pirates with ruthless efficiency. After his 1807 death, she led the Red Banner Fleet, adopting Western tech to resist foreign invaders, becoming a legendary anti-colonial heroine in Qing China’s decline.  All visual representations in this production are 100% generated by artificial intelligence (AIGC).
response.title: Pirate Queen: Zheng Yi Sao
